The Desert Laboratory of the Carnegie Institution of Washington: History and Achievements

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: The Desert Laboratory of the Carnegie Institution of Washington: History and Achievements 1981
did.abstract: William Grovenor McGinnies was an arid lands ecologist, educator; University of Arizona Assistant Professor, 1927-1929, Associate Professor, 1930-1932, Acting Head of the Botany Department, 1932-1935, Director of Lab Tree Research, 1960-1964, Director of Office of Arid Land Studies and Professor of Dendrochronology, 1965-1969, Research ecologist Office of Arid Land Studies, 1969-1974. Originally published as Discovering the Desert: Legacy of the Carnegie Desert Botanical Laboratory, by the University of Arizona Press, Tucson, 1981. Original typescript with figures and photographs.

repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Arid lands ecologist, educator; University of Arizona Assistant Professor, 1927-1929, Associate Professor, 1930-1932, Acting Head of the Botany Department, 1932-1935, Director of Lab Tree Research, 1960-1964, Director of Office of Arid Land Studies and Professor of Dendrochronology, 1965-1969, Research ecologist Office of Arid Land Studies, 1969-1974.

scopecontent.p: Original typescript with figures and photographs.

relatedmaterial.p: Published as Discovering the Desert: Legacy of the Carnegie Desert Botanical Laboratory, by the University of Arizona Press, Tucson, 1981.
Related materials may be found at: AZ 356, AZ 518, AZ 566.
